website_summaries.verdict: Outstanding quality in a set of holiday dinnerware made to serve 4.
pros: Artwork on these plates and cups looks great, and it's a little more subtle than some other options
Consists of ivory bone china with 24K gold accents, so it delivers a sense of elegance
Made in the United States, so you can trust the quality
cons: More expensive than some other options

customer_reviews.title: not the fine china from years past
customer_reviews.text: The ease in which the purchase was made was quite satisfactory. I was a little taken back by the Lenox quality. I already own this pattern. I needed to add some dinner pieces. There is an obvious difference in the quality of the product. My original pieces are of a higher quality. The pieces I received are thicker in appearance, not the fine china from years past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product came not as advertised, one broken mug and one of the three mugs was a different size, probably the teacup. Packaging was not what I was expecting; someone tried very hard to wrap everything well but the box was very banged up and again, the broken product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mc

customer_reviews.title: Classic Beauty!
customer_reviews.text: Love Lenox Holiday 12-Piece Dinnerware Set as the small amount of serving pieces (3) is "simply" perfect. Any more pieces and the pattern becomes too busy. I mix this small Holiday set with the Lenox Eternal pattern to create a refined modern Christmas table. Especially appreciate the fact that these Lenox pieces are still made in America.
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: The beginning of my Christmas China!! Designed in 1974 and still being made today.... This is a classic Christmas China set worth lots of pieces available!! Will add to my collection every year!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set. Return impossible
customer_reviews.text: A very nice and decorative set. Beautiful in design. On plate had a bubble in the gold leaf. Unable to replace one plate without returning the entire set. Had to order one plate separate.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence b cahill jr

customer_reviews.title: Its design is as good as its reputation, but the quality of products is disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Carefully inspect them on arrival. One of the cups has scratch on near the handle. Two of dinner plates have uneven bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hyeji Park

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Lenox Christmas pattern
customer_reviews.text: I now have service for 20! My favorite Lenox Christmas pattern! I can also mix and match it with my Lenox "Eternal" pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Sewsuper

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas anytime.
customer_reviews.text: These dishes uplifted my spirits during the first days of self isolation.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra polley

customer_reviews.title: Lenox Holiday Dinnerware
customer_reviews.text: Stunningly beautiful Christmas China, I will use these forever, and see them becoming a family heirloom to be passed down to my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: D Ernser

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Dinnerware. These dishes will be a yearly tradition for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I set my dining room table with them and leave them on display all through Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Victorian gal

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced lovely holiday china
customer_reviews.text: Lenox Holiday Plates are a little smaller than my everyday china plates. But they arrived in perfect condition. Reasonably priced. I was happy to have them for my Christmas table
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have just started collecting this pattern, although I have admired it for years. I was very excited to receive the 12-piece set, which came promptly and packaged well, and I was not disappointed. The dishes are beautiful. I'm looking forward to adding to my collection and using them this year during the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So glad this arrived safely and I was able to add to my mother's collection of this china!
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: holiday dinnerware
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived just a few days after ordering. It was packed well in an attractive box for gifting. The order process was simple and easy to complete. The dinnerware was a gift for our daughter. She loves it and can hardly wait for the Christmas holidays to use it. Hopefully, Amazon will have more pieces in this pattern so I can add to her collection.
customer_reviews.author: brion

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Two of the plates where missing the gold on the rim
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful holiday dished and they go with anything. I use them for Thanksgiving also.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast & well packed. Will be back for next item to my collection. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got the order on time...china was in-tack - nothing broken of chipped
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Just right for a completer set for my grand daughter
customer_reviews.author: Linda Otto

customer_reviews.title: Christmas dinnerware
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this purchase. It was purchased as an addition to a four place setting I had received the previous year.
customer_reviews.author: Rmar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Lenox Christmas dishes. I used them twice over the Holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying the china very much . Thanks. I'm thrilled it is made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Susan James Clark

customer_reviews.title: Wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: Lenox Holiday dinnerware set was given as a Wedding gift. I was not able to attend this wedding but wanted to be remember by a gift as I will not be in any of their wedding photos. So, I know they will enjoy many holiday memories using this beautiful dinnerware & hopefully think of me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My Wife discovered these plates and design just a few days before Christmas and showed the add to me. I ordered them immediately from Amazon and was able to get them before Christmas Dinner. We used them to celebrate the season. The China is dishwasher safe. We ordered another set as we were so thrilled with the quality and the beauty of this set. We are now purchasing the bowls and other accessories to this pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Howard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality china dishes
customer_reviews.text: These XMAS dishes are beautiful and the price was good, however Amazon needs to do a better job of packing this set. One mug arrived in several pieces. The dishes were in a box from Lenox and that box was put into another cardboard box without any other packing material. I'm surprised that more dishes didn't break. That being said, I do love the dishes, very elegant and a classic style that would enhance any holiday table.
customer_reviews.author: Mad potter

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHRISTMAS CHINA EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Finely made, awesome china. I had a set of 20 place settings years ago and due to unforeseen circumstances, had to get rid of it. I am now in the process of replacing my entire set. Can't wait to have it finished. BEST CHRISTMAS CHINA EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Paula R.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this festive set of dishes. They are sturdy and durable. They looked beautiful on our table during the holiday season. Can't wait till I can use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Luvbead

customer_reviews.title: Elegant dishes.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, well-packed item. These dishes are so classic and elegant looking.
customer_reviews.author: M. Prince

customer_reviews.title: Better, faster and cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Lenox makes quality china. This sale was a great value! It came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: OkiePoke

customer_reviews.title: ... of this to my sister-in-law for Christmas and she loved it as much as I do
customer_reviews.text: I gave 12 place settings of this to my sister-in-law for Christmas and she loved it as much as I do. She got nothing but compliments on her Christmas dinner table. Everything was well packed and not one item arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Lady

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful, so siimple and elegant!
customer_reviews.text: We love these dishes for our holiday meals. We started collecting them little by little and have purchased several sets. They come in a wonderful, strong box, so that they can be stored away the rest of the year safely. The little mug is just right for today's casual living, for either coffee or tea. The quality is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Luchi1012

customer_reviews.title: Lenoxs Holiday Dinnerware Set
customer_reviews.text: I received two twelve piece dinnerware sets and was very pleased at the speed of delivery. The sets were exactly as I expected and arrived without any damaged pieces. The best thing about this fine dinnerware is that it is dishwasher safe! I am now enjoying my holiday dinnerware and love it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Rabon

customer_reviews.title: Really love the classic design
customer_reviews.text: Really love the classic design,,also the mugs keep my coffee and tea at the right teemperature for a much longer time than regular cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lenox Holiday China
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Lenox and have started my dauther-in-laws with the Christmas Holiday Plates. They are beautiful on the table with the candles light shining off of them. You will not be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine J. Barlo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Used Them Last Christmas --- Recommend them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, used them for Christmas and loved them.
customer_reviews.author: JNV

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful elegance
customer_reviews.text: This holiday tableware set is beautiful, understated elegance - not too "christmasy" but with a lovely design that will look perfect on any holiday table!
customer_reviews.author: Maria L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got a good deal on these dishes . Love this pattern.
customer_reviews.author: spider

customer_reviews.title: Lenox
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dinnerware purchased as a gift to my daughter Christmas. Made in America and can be put in the dishwasher. The serving pieces will be great gifts to give to add to the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cassy
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the dinnerware so much. Can't wait for the holidays to get my table decked out. Now I have enough for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: cassy

customer_reviews.title: Gift hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: We ought this for our daughter and she loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: david morse

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had had option when I purchased sets (plate ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had had option when I purchased sets (plate,salad,butter,cups and saucers,bowls,etc.) Bought 24 place settings and now only use the above items.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My friend has a partial set of this particular china pattern. It is absolutely beautiful. I purchased this for him and he was absolutely thrilled with his gift.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Swander

product_meta.title: Lenox Holiday 12-Piece Dinnerware Set
product_meta.description:
Style Name:12-Piece Dinnerware SetThe Holiday 12-Piece Dinnerware Set is crafted from durable ivory bone china with 24-karat gold accents. A charming holly and berry motif graces the surface. Set includes four dinner plates, four salad plates and four mugs.

AMAZON.COM
A best-selling seasonal favorite since 1974, Holiday dinnerware from Lenox sets a festive table for either everyday or special occasion use during the holidays. Crafted of Lenox ivory fine china and banded generously with 24-karat gold, the pattern features a white background sprightly bordered with a wreath of bright green holly and red berries. This twelve-piece set consists of four of each of the following: 10-1/2-inch dinner plate, 8-inch salad plate, and 12-ounce mug. Instead of a holly border, each mug features a bouquet of holly on two sides, and glows with extra gold trim on the handle and around the base. 

 Ideal as a gift, this set starts or adds to a collection of Holiday gold-banded dinnerware and items for the home. The gold trim means the items are not microwave-safe but are fine for convenient cleaning in the dishwasher. Lenox backs its products with a lifetime warranty, and will replace any unsatisfactory item or provide the customer a full refund. In addition, under its lifetime breakage replacement program, Lenox will replace any broken piece that is in stock at 50 percent off the current suggested retail price. --Ann Bieri 

 What's in the Box
4 place settings. Each place setting consists of: dinner plate; salad plate; mug. 12 pieces total.
